Package upoints :: Module gpx :: Class Waypoint

[frames] | no frames]

Class Waypoint

 object --+        
          |        
point.Point --+    
              |    
       _GpxElem --+
                  |
                 Waypoint

Class for representing a waypoint element from GPX data files

>>> Waypoint(52, 0)
Waypoint(52.0, 0.0, None, None)
>>> Waypoint(52, 0, None)
Waypoint(52.0, 0.0, None, None)
>>> Waypoint(52, 0, "name", "desc")
Waypoint(52.0, 0.0, 'name', 'desc')

Since: 0.8.0
